messages.subject: Raffle for Live and Learn Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hey All, Please bring something for the raffle (handmade item, gently used or unused item, (blueberry!) honey ;-), toys, puzzles, books, services.) Also:
messages.messageBody:
Hey All,

Please bring something for the raffle (handmade item, gently used or unused item, (blueberry!) honey ;-), toys, puzzles, books, services.)

Also:

Passion Basket Silent Auction http://www.liveandlearnconference.org/specialevents.html scroll down the page to see info.

Share your passion. Fill a basket with non-new items to be silently auctioned. Knitters, Cooks, Animal lovers, Sculptors...

All money from these two things goes into the scholarship fund. Let's raise as much as we can; no one is turned away from a scholarship request.

Thank you for your help,
Jill

P.S. If you can't be at the conference but would like to donate something, please email me jparmer@... , and I will give you an address where you can send your item.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
